forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. Southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a gently overcast sky, the clouds softly cloaking the horizon in a muted embrace. The cool chill of the early morning lingers, hinting at the lingering fog that often sneaks in from the ocean, yet today seems to hold a promise of warmth as the sun prepares to break free. The forecast nudges the temperature towards a comfortable high of around sixty-eight, before tapering gracefully in the afternoon, leaving the day ripe for a leisurely stroll.

The marine layer gently hugs the coastline, a reminder of the bay's ever-changing character, but it looks set to retreat, giving way to clearer skies. The breeze, a soft whisper of southwest winds, will not disturb the serenity, making the city feel pleasantly inviting. Dress comfortably, perhaps in layers, to embrace the coolness of morning and the mild warmth that the sun promises to deliver as the day unfolds. 

Embrace the opportunity to explore the quieter corners of the city; perhaps enjoy an early coffee at a local café, letting the world awaken around you, or wander through one of the lesser-known parks where nature unfolds in quiet beauty. The day ahead beckons with a mild charm, perfect for savoring the simple pleasures of urban life.
